name: The Da Vinci Code
description: A gripping, fast-paced thriller that combines art, history, and religion. Symbologist Robert Langdon uncovers secrets hidden in famous works of art and sacred texts.
author: Dan Brown

name: The Hunger Games
description: In a future society divided into districts, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister’s place in a deadly competition known as The Hunger Games, where teens fight for survival.
author: Suzanne Collins

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
description: A passionate romance between a college graduate, Anastasia Steele, and a wealthy entrepreneur, Christian Grey. Their complex relationship centers around dominance and submission.
author: E.L. James

name: The Girl on the Train
description: Rachel, a troubled woman with a drinking problem, becomes entangled in the disappearance of a woman she watched from the train every day.
author: Paula Hawkins

name: The Help
description: Set in 1960s Mississippi, three women—two African American maids and a young white journalist—work together to write a book about the lives of black domestic workers.
author: Kathryn Stockett

name: A Song of Ice and Fire
description: This series, including the famous 'Game of Thrones' books, follows the power struggles among noble families in the fictional continent of Westeros.
author: George R.R. Martin

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
description: The final book in the Harry Potter series where Harry, Ron, and Hermione embark on a mission to destroy Voldemort’s Horcruxes and defeat him once and for all.
author: J.K. Rowling

name: The Alchemist
description: A young shepherd named Santiago embarks on a journey to discover his personal legend and the meaning of life.
author: Paulo Coelho

name: Becoming
description: The former First Lady of the United States shares her life story, from her childhood in Chicago to her years in the White House.
author: Michelle Obama

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
description: The novel follows Kya, the 'Marsh Girl,' who grows up in the wild swamps of North Carolina and is eventually accused of murder. It's a coming-of-age story with elements of romance and mystery.
author: Delia Owens
